name: Halal Now
description: A food-tech web application for the UK, similar to UberEats. It enables seamless web ordering and provides built-in marketing tools, analytics, and full menu and order management for restaurants and admin users. Developed the web application using React.js, Redux, and Node.js.

name: Ignite
description: Developed and managed the real-time chat service for Pakistan Startup Connect, an initiative by the Ministry of IT&T, Government of Pakistan. The system handled 50,000+ daily messages and 10,000+ concurrent users, enabling seamless communication between investors nationwide.

name: Edge Now
description: It offers real-time inventory management, multi-location support, staff management, detailed sales reporting, and seamless order processing. Developed using React.js for the frontend, Node.js and Laravel for the backend, and Docker for containerized deployment

name: Noca
description: Full-stack social media platform delivering real-time friend discovery and live location tracking. Engineered a Node.js/Express backend, built a Next.js admin panel, integrated Grafana dashboards for analytics, and Dockerized the entire stack for scalable deployment.

name: Shadiayana Wedding Bazar
description: Responsive event management platform built with React.js, Redux, and Ant Design, featuring device-optimized pages, improved user experience and collaborative GitHub-driven feature delivery.

name: ADSS Ottawa
description: Responsive event management platform built with React.js, Redux, and Ant Design, featuring device-optimized pages, improved user experience and collaborative GitHub-driven feature delivery
